ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of DONALD BRUCE GARROW of Toronto, Ontario, to be a part-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 22, 2018.
